Lawrence Mukomberanwa (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1976) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe.
Nwa Nicholas Mukomberanwa, Lawrence (mgbe ụfọdụ a na-asupe Laurence) na nna ya rụkọrọ ọrụ site na nwata ya
Ọ gara n'ihu na-akpụ ihe mgbe ọ na-azụ ka ọ bụrụ onye na-anya ụgbọelu. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọhịa ruo afọ ole na ole tupu ọ tụgharịa gaa n'ịkpụ ihe oge niile
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi Europe.

Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-anya ụgbọelu mana ọ kwụsịrị itinye aka na ọrụ ezinụlọ.
Lawrence Mukomberanwa, nwa onye na-akpụ ihe Nicholas, na-ekwu na ọ dịghị akwa ụta mgbe ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ ọkachamara ya dị ka onye na-anya ụgbọelu n'oge na-adịbeghị anya iji soro nzọụkwụ nna ya
Isiokwu Laurence na-ekwu maka ọdịiche na mmegide
Ọ na-echegbu onwe ya banyere ọdịiche nke ike n'etiti ịda ogbenye na akụ na ụba.
Mukomberanwa bụ onye otu ezinụlọ Mukomberanwa nke ndị na-akpụ ihe
Ọ bụ nwa nke ọgbọ mbụ Shona art sculptors Grace Mukomberanwa na Nicholas Mukomberanwa
Mukomberanwa bụ nwanne Anderson, Tendai, Taguma, Netsai, na Ennica Mukomberanwa, na nwa nwanne nne Nesbert Mukomberanwa, ha niile bụ ndị na-akpụ ihe.
